creator: AI-Team
descriptionHtml:
Name on Pictures - Name Art is an application that helps you to create and write any text on pictures for your friends & family members. There is nothing better than receiving a heartfelt greeting card from a friend or loved one. Create personalized love pictures with awesome backgrounds images for every occasion. You can create birthday card, anniversary card, love images , name card and many more. Celebrate all festival and events with Name on Pictures - Name Art application .

You can write your name or any text on different styles of background & decorate with different decorative items like love stickers, heart shapes, Emoji and many more.

You can choose background image from wide range of background templates and write any text you want, for that we have handcrafted some stunning photo background and background textures you will surely love. Choose beautiful background frames and create stunning love cards & name cards.

Name on Pictures - Name Art application have different kind of background image like love background, tea cup background, Birthday Cake Background, Anniversary cake background, stylish locket background & many more.

You can share photos with your friends very easily via social networking sites.
descriptionShort: Write fancy & stylish text on beautiful backgrounds - Write Name On Picture.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We added new features for dear users.

title: Name On Pics - Name Art

creator: Devabits Inc
descriptionHtml:
Name on Photo - invitations Maker is a free application to write your name, any text you want on beautiful backgrounds, or you can name art with ease and design a unique and more wonderful image.

Designing a picture or invitation card was a difficult and expensive process but not anymore, with the application of name on picture - invitation card maker will help you create invitation cards for your friends and family members and write your name on picture with ease in a few minutes.

There is nothing better than receiving invitation card from a friend or family member. Now you can create personalized invitation cards and love cards with beautiful background images for all occasions. When you use the application of name on picture - invitation card designer, you can write your name or any text on images and decorate it with different and very beautiful decorative elements. And also create invitation birthday card, congratulation invitation and many more.

You can choose an image for the occasion you are going through from a wide range of ready-made templates and write the text you want on it. Name on picture app contain on the feature of writing on photo and name art that helps you design invitations, invitation wedding cards, congratulations on New Year, invitation card for Christmas, congratulations and Ramadan cards and congratulatory messages for all occasions.

● How to use the application Write name on photo - invitation card maker :
◦ Choose the photo you want or import an image from your phone.
◦ Add your name or any text you want on the image using the tool to add text on image.
◦ Add an aesthetic touch to the image by adding wonderful stickers as well as applying filters to the images.
◦ Press the save button to save the image in your phone.
◦ You can share the image on social networking sites and all image sharing programs.

Express your feelings through beautiful love cards and share it with your love, you can also write your name with your love or name art and decorate it with amazing art. Add beautiful text on your photo with lots of decorative elements like love stickers, birthday stickers, photo frames and many more.

Name Art - invitation maker app provides you with a large collection of the most beautiful and romantic images of love, where you can write love letters, phrases and beautiful love quotes for your lover, and design high-quality professional love images using professional tools and with ease.
descriptionShort: Write name on beautiful picture and design invitation card for all occasions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
◦ Modify the design of the application and make a design that is comfortable to use.
◦ Fixed all errors that appeared to our dear users.
◦ We added a lot of packages of photos for all occasions.
◦ Updating write on images tool feature and many other features to facilitate the user experience.
